title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first pagei. the first and second column could be mergedj.
OB: The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up/down can be applied on more than one item. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. The table should have a label to accommodate a mnemonic. The user should be able to select multiple items for move up/down functionality. The signature preview label should wrap its content. The signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR: To reproduce the issue, change the parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview gets cut off.
